001package face_plugins_tests;
002
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005
006import ij.IJ;
007import ij.io.LogStream;
008import ij.io.OpenDialog;
009import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
010import imagingbook.lib.util.ResourceUtils;
011import imagingbook.violajones.lib.HaarCascadeDescriptor;
012import imagingbook.violajones.resources.Data;
013import imagingbook.violajones.resources.xml.HaarTrainingSet;
014
015
016/**
017 * This ImageJ plugin lists the available OpenCV cascade descriptor files.
018 * Currently only "old style" XML files (of type "opencv-haar-classifier")
019 * can be read.
020 * 
021 * @author WB
022 */
023public class List_Haar_Cascade implements PlugIn {
024        
025        static {
026                LogStream.redirectSystem();
027        }
028
029        public void run(String arg) {
030                String xmlRoot = ResourceUtils.getResourcePath(Data.class, "xml").toString();
031                //String xmlRoot = ResourceUtils.getResourcePath(HaarTrainingSet.class, "").toString();
032                OpenDialog od = new OpenDialog("Select XML file", xmlRoot, "");
033                String xmlPath = od.getPath();
034                if (xmlPath == null) return;
035                if (!xmlPath.endsWith(".xml")) {
036                        IJ.error("this is not an XML file!");
037                        return;
038                }
039
040                System.out.println("XML path: " + xmlPath);
041                
042                File file = new File(xmlPath);
043                String name = file.getName();
044                System.out.println("XML file: " + name);
045                                
046//              InputStream strm = ResourceUtils.getResourceStream(Data.class, "xml/haarcascade_frontalface_alt2.xml");
047//              InputStream strm = Data.class.getResourceAsStream("xml/haarcascade_frontalface_alt2.xml");
048//              
049                InputStream strm = HaarTrainingSet.class.getResourceAsStream(name);
050                if (strm == null) {
051                        IJ.log("could not open XML stream for " + xmlPath);
052                        return;
053                }
054
055                IJ.log("Reading XML stream ...");
056                HaarCascadeDescriptor hc = HaarCascadeDescriptor.fromInputStream(strm);
057                hc.print();
058
059                IJ.log("done.");
060        }
061
062}
